website_summaries.verdict: Both low odor and nontoxic, this collection of 12 markers features 3 each of the boldest dry erase colors.
pros: Comes as a set of 12 markers, with 3 each of blue, black, green, and red
Work well for both dry erase boards and glass
Erase well, with no ghosting marks left behind
cons: Some felt that the point of these markers was not that fine

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Quite satisfied with the value I got for the price. Even more satisfied with how good they look and how well they perform.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: I have tried these and they work well. Cannot comment on how long they last, as I have not yet expended one. Bought these for teacher friends. Nice colors.
customer_reviews.author: S. Green

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's like a super pack. This seller know what we need. They also have all black markers piece. Solid quality and last longer. Look great and work even better.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Strain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has all the essential colors but more pieces, so that I don't have to go by a new package every week. Very convenient! Also they work neatly. I made some pictures so that everyone knows what the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Necaise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for teachers and adults-fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of dry erase markers. It comes with great colors and perfect size. It works awesome on dry erase board and easy to wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These markers write smooth without being too inky, there is no scratchy noise when you write, these are great. Colors are vivid, I like having four colors. For three children doing remote learning this academic year, I got them each a small white board and split one pack of these between them. Also bought a second box for a large white board for myself to help with their work. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Price

customer_reviews.title: good value pack
customer_reviews.text: though a little expensive than other products in the similar type, these are super fun and the toddler loves them. he's been using these for pretty much all his coloring activities. good quality though make sure to keep them capped when not in use. we lost a couple because the toddler didnt cap them off after his activity and we couldnt revive them. overall a good one for the money
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great markers
customer_reviews.text: These are great dry erase markers. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Bultman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The red and green are great. The blue writes rough and spotty. The black is very light...I used the best one in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Robb

customer_reviews.title: Come dry brand new. Don't write well at all. Pitiful!
customer_reviews.text: These dry erase markers were the worst I think I've ever bought never again waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. Great colors, smooth writing and easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always can use more
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I always needs extra in the classroom. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

product_meta.title: Excellent Dry Erase Markers for Whiteboard. Perfect in Classrooms and Offices. Amazing Big Pack of Four Bright Colors 12 Total Markers. Fine Thin Tip, Easy Erase 3 Each of Green, Black, Blue, and Red
feature_bullets: ✅MULTIPURPOSE MARKERS - Teach, define, create & communicate! These fantastic dry erase markers are perfect for showing off your imagination on all non-porous surfaces such as as whiteboards, glass and so much more! Just add imagination, we will do the rest!
✅DEEP, INTENSE COLOR wakes up your inner artist! Make your point in the brightest way possible! Includes 12 markers (3 green, black, blue, and red)

✅SAFETY FIRST - Thanks to our ecological production procedures and industry-leading quality control, our dry erase markers are non-toxic and almost odorless. We care about you and we care about keeping your trust!

✅KEEP YOUR WHITEBOARD WHITE - Our unique no-smudge formula makes these markers extremely easy to erase. Write with flair, correct with confidence and take your training sessions to the next level! Whenever your projects need a clear and impactive explanation, these markers make life easier and more COLORFUL!
✅SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We are a US-based, family-owned business that promises superior customer service including excellent communication and easy returns.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
